errors.error_description: The manual installation instructions are missing a critical required dependency, `django-mptt`, which will cause the application to fail.
correction_candidates: The installation instructions should be simplified to `pip install django-machina`, which correctly installs all required dependencies automatically.
Add the missing command `pip install django-mptt` to the list.
The dependency `django-mptt` must be installed for the application to work.
Update the installation block to include `pip install django-mptt`.
errors.golden_answer: The installation instructions should be simplified to `pip install django-machina`, which correctly installs all required dependencies automatically.
